title: Unraveling sub-leading twist GTMDs of proton using LFQDM
authors: Shubham Sharma, Sameer Jain and Harleen Dahiya
abstract:
This study investigates the sub-leading twist generalized transverse momentum
dependent distributions (GTMDs) of a proton within the light-front
quark-diquark model (LFQDM) framework. We solve the parametrization equations
for the Dirac matrix structure to yield the explicit GTMD expressions for
scalar as well as vector diquark configurations for active $u$ and $d$ quarks.
This analysis addresses the multi-dimensional nature of GTMDs by exploring
their dependencies on one or two variables while keeping others fixed.
Additionally, we extract transverse momentum dependent form factors (TMFFs)
from GTMDs by integrating over the longitudinal momentum fraction $x$. The
study uses $3$-dimensional plots to illustrate the variation of TMFFs with the
quark's transverse momentum $p_{\perp}$ and the transverse momentum transfer to
the proton $\Delta_{\perp}$.
